scripts.openapi-generate: docker run --rm -v ${PWD}/openapi:/out openapitools/openapi-generator-cli:v6.0.1 generate --generator-name typescript-fetch --input-spec https://raw.githubusercontent.com/openapitools/openapi-generator/master/modules/openapi-generator/src/test/resources/3_0/petstore.yaml --output /out --api-package api --model-package model --generate-alias-as-model --additional-properties supportsES6=true --additional-properties withInterfaces=true --additional-properties withSeparateModelsAndApi=true
